title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. H, ch. I, pt. 346 - Staff Development
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. H, ch. I, pt. 346 - Staff Development

State Regulations
§ 346.1 - Definition
§ 346.2 - Objective
§ 346.3 - Requirements for staff development plans
§ 346.4 - Requirements for the departmental coordination of all probation training
§ 346.5 - Requirements for training in fundamentals for new probation officers
§ 346.6 - Requirements for continuing training of probation officers
§ 346.7 - Requirements for the training of supervisory/management and executive personnel in a probation department
§ 346.8 - Special requirements for the training para-professional, clerical and secretarial positions
§ 346.9 - Repealed
§ 346.10 - Repealed
§ 346.11 to 346.13 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. H, ch. I, pt. 346

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 242[2], 243[1], 245, 257 [4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
